import React from 'react'; import Dropdown from 'react-bootstrap/Dropdown'; function InfoContainer({showStationInfo}){ //Contains Info About Station and Nearby Places return (

{" "} {showStationInfo || ""}

Suggested Places

Attractions Place 1 Place 2 Place 3 Shopping Place 1 Place 2 Place 3 Community Facilities Place 1 Place 2 Place 3 Parks and Gardens Place 1 Place 2 Place 3 Schools and Institutions Place 1 Place 2 Place 3 Offices and Residences Place 1 Place 2 Place 3
); } export default InfoContainer;
